about_the_game:
In a world where criminals possess superpowers, radical changes to the law must be made. Employing the concept of "Guilty until proven innocent", the world of crime only hope was Alexander Twist, a rising star that excels in quick thinking, deduction and cheating.

Riding on the waves of victory, Alexander enjoyed the rotten fruits of his success... until one person said, enough. Framed for the arson of his own apartment, Alexander and his four hamsters must now battle against the entire law system. The shrewd lawyer will have to use every trick up his sleeve to escape the looming sentence, not knowing success means a much, much worse fate....



  • Build Your Case: Supernatural murders require a perceptive eye. Investigate and gather clues at the scene using point & click, and make sure to beware the traps laid by the culprit.

  • A Trial By Wit: Dominate the battlefield in an Ace Attorney style. Find weak spots in arguments and present the evidence in flashy Objection! moments. Don't be distracted by the chaos though, a culprit's ploy might have multiple layers of mystery.

  • Always Fresh: Try your hand at over seven mind-boggling trials, each testing your creativity and deduction ability to the limit. From Umineko to Agatha Christie to a Werewolf game, every trial has its own unique style!

  • A Web of Lies: Past and present collide in a thrilling, multi-protagonist plot that will always keep you on your toes. Over 25 hours of heart-throbbing mystery guaranteed!

  • Winning Is Everything: Use your defensive and offensive lawyer skills to turn the tide of the battle. From Alexander's evil tricks to Elena's burning pressure, both sides will use everything in their disposal to win.

  • Can You Untangle The Web?: Alexander Twist is a supernatural detective visual novel with gameplay inspired by Ace Attorney and Danganronpa. However, logic, deduction and creativity skills won't be enough to untangle the web. What are you willing to risk in order to come out on top?

content_descriptors.notes: The game's story features mutilation, suicide, beheading, animal abuse and torture. Some other minor offenses found in the game are tobacco, profanity and the devouring of human flesh.

short_description: Can you defeat the world's oldest mastermind in their own game? Stretch your wits and deduction skills to the maximum as you battle in Paris' craziest court. Here, only those who sacrifice everything reach the truth. What are you willing to betray to make it out alive?
